snippet: The rules, which were approved by the Arizona Legislature in 2012 and will take effect on Tuesday, restrict the use of medication to induce abortions during the early stages of pregnancy.
abstract: Federal Judge David C Bury refuses to block Arizona rules on limiting the use of abortion drugs; Planned Parenthood believes new restrictions will force many women to undergo unnecessary surgical abortions and prevent some women from getting an abortion at all.
lead_paragraph: The rules, which were approved by the Arizona Legislature in 2012 and will take effect on Tuesday, restrict the use of medication to induce abortions during the early stages of pregnancy.

headline.main: Judge Won’t Block Rules on Abortion Drug in Arizona
headline.print_headline: Judge Won’t Block Rules on Abortion Drug
